name: neodb
tagline: A self-hosted social catalog for books movies and music
description: Neodb is a social cataloging platform for movies, books, and music inspired by Douban. It enables self-hosted users to track and rate media collections with feeds, comments, and lists.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Track movies, books, music, games, and podcasts in a unified collection

features.title: Rating System
features.description: Rate and review media with customizable scoring and written feedback

features.title: Activity Feeds
features.description: Follow other users and see their reviews, ratings, and collection updates

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Organize media into custom lists like watchlists, favorites, or themed collections

features.title: Social Features
features.description: Comment on reviews, like posts, and interact with other users' content

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Migrate data from Douban or other platforms with bulk import tools

features.title: Metadata Fetching
features.description: Automatically retrieve information, covers, and details from external databases

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Mark media as watching, reading, or listening with progress indicators
